Rental Conditions (Full)

Requirements & Eligibility

  • Valid driver's license (minimum 2 years)
  • Passport/ID required at pickup
  • Minimum age depends on vehicle class

Insurance & Coverage

  • Comprehensive insurance with standard excess
  • Optional zero-excess coverage available
  • Damage due to misuse is not covered

Deposits & Payments

  • Refundable security deposit held on card
  • Credit/debit cards and bank transfers accepted
  • VAT and local taxes may apply

Mileage, Fuel & Usage

  • Daily mileage allowance; extras billed per km
  • Return with same fuel level or refueling fee applies
  • No off-road, racing, or towing permitted

Delivery, Drivers & Fines

  • Citywide delivery/collection on request
  • Additional drivers must be registered
  • Traffic fines and Salik/HGS are renter's responsibility

Cancellations & Assistance

  • Free cancellation window; late cancellations may incur fees
  • No-show policy applies after scheduled pickup time
  • 24/7 roadside assistance for mechanical issues

Full conditions are provided on your rental agreement. Please contact us for bespoke arrangements.
